attributes.action: encourage people to grow their own fruit and vegetable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the rise of obesity and associated diseases, we ask the Prime Minister to take the initiative to encourage people to grow their own fruit and vegetables to get their "five a day".

This could be achieved by small things such as reducing tax on seeds and garden equipment, a nationwide campaign and even making it mandatory for all new homes built with gardens to have an unturfed area that could be used as an allotment.
